title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.724 - Distribution systems: service lines
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.724 - Distribution systems: service lines

State Regulations

After April 1, 2021, when an operator has access to a
customer"TMs premises for, among other things, responding to an odor complaint
or conducting inspections required under section 255.481 or
255.723
of this Part, where the
service line is installed below grade through the outer foundation wall of a
building, the operator shall visually inspect the seal at the foundation wall
and replace or install the seal, as needed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.724

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
